nodes.text: Thank you for coming here. I'm about to head down to the Catacombs.
Ah, there you are! I hoped you would come. I'm about to head into the Catacombs.
Are you ready to brave the dangers of the Catacombs?

Yes, I have some of our favorite toffee and my father's ring for the ceremony. I have enough magical protections on me that I should be able to avoid any encounters with Undead on my way to the Paladin Memorial.
Would you like me to go with you?
You would do that for me? You know how dangerous the Catacombs are.
Thank you so much. It will be great to have you by my side when I speak to my father's ghost.
I'd like you to meet me at the Memorial. We'll attract less unwanted attention if we sneak there by ourselves.
What's the best way to the Paladin Memorial?
From the stairs down from the Sea Caves, go north through the door to the area with the tomb of Morris. Then make a left turn to head west.

If you continue westward, you'll eventually find an area with the Paladin symbol on the floor. Go through the door to the south and the corridor will lead to the Memorial. It's really not that hard to find.
I hope you're right. That's not a place I want to get lost.
I have to do the ceremony tonight. If you don't show up before two in the morning, I'll have to do it without you. Please try to make it by midnight.
Midnight... right.
And Shawn, thank you. Your friendship means a great deal to me.
Good luck with your quest - and be careful. I don't want to be haunted by you next Night of the Dead.
<nod>
If you don't make it back alive, it only ghost to show you that you can't always get what you haunt no matter what you grue.
What's going on?
I'm going to the Paladin Memorial tonight to speak with my father's ghost.
Isn't that a little dangerous, especially during the Nights of the Dead?
Yes, but tonight may be my only chance to make my peace with my father. I never got a chance to say goodbye. I want him to know that I'll always love him.
Would you like me to go with you? It's safer than being alone on a night like tonight.
You'd do that for me? Thank you, I really appreciate your kind offer.
I'd like you to meet me at the Paladin Memorial around Midnight tonight. We'll attract less unwanted attention if we sneak there by ourselves.
What's the best way to the Paladin Memorial?
From the stairs down to the Sea Caves, go north through the door to the area with the tomb of Morris. Then make a left turn to head east.

If you continue eastward, you'll eventually find an area with the Paladin symbol on the floor. Go through the door to the south and the corridor will lead to the Memorial. It's really not that hard to find.
What if I don't make it by midnight?
I'll wait as long as I can, but it has to be done tonight. If you don't make it by one in the morning, I'll do the ceremony without you.
However, I'll be fine. I have plenty of protections against Undead and I'll sneak past all the dangers. Don't worry - I'm a Rogue, after all.
You better put on your best sneaking boots and stealth cloak tonight, It'll be scary dangerous down there. Good luck - and come back alive, okay?
I'll do that.
You know, it's going to be very dangerous tonight. How about a kiss for good luck?
<kisses Shawn's cheek>
<whisper> Good luck, Shawn.
Good luck to you, too.
Good luck and take care.
You too. I'll see you later.
